Franks right you can look it up thru google or yahoo most likely.... 
   
  The city local library is usually a good resource as far as news articles and books written on the subject in question they may even have history files already gathered on the places. Sometimes they even have old photographs or letters of previous occupants.
   
   
  Misty
   
   
  Amy Swanson <lon3_s7ar@...> wrote:
            Does anyone know about HELL HOUSE and BLACK SWAN INN, here in san antonio?
  I am going to a hunt and want the paranormal and history of these places. 
   
   
  amy
